story:
If you'd like to hear more of my story, below is a short clip from a documentary I'm featured in call 'I cure cancer'.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kgPNDgPq8D0

 Hello, My name is J. Cynthia Brooks and I want to thank you for visiting my campaign. Some of you know I've been an actor and dancer my enture life, perhaps most notable, I was a contract player on the daytime series Days Of Our Lives. Always pretty healthy.   

A few years after I left 'Days', I was diagnosed with cancer. I was told by several oncoligists if I didn't get surgery, chemotherapy, and radiation treatments, I would not live beyond 2 years. The cancer was that aggressive and had already made it into some of my lymph nodes. Yet even with all the conventional western medicine treatments, there was no gaurentee I would live.

 I had been dabbling in what is called Alternative (or natural) medicine for quite some time and after a tremendious amount of research, I decided to treat my cancer using only Alternative medicine.

It worked, I was completely cured of cancer in 8 months and have been cancer free now for the 16 years. I always have fun telling people the lab. had to send my patholagy test results back 3 times, they couldn't believe my cell rehabilitation either!

The only problem now was the cost. The top supplements, juicers, etc. (all of which I did) are usually very expensive, and for good reason, but I was bankrupt. I had to choose between money and my life. I choose my life.

I slowly found my way back financilly and was (and still am) devoted to assisting others in healing themselves with alternative medicine, if that is their desire. I've been doing so over the past 16 years, and the same financial problem kept popping up. Most cancer patiants still go the surgery, chemo. route first, and when it fails them, then they try the alternative route. But by then, even with insurance, they find themselves anywhere from 10,000 to 400,000 doallars in debt.  They can not afford supplements or to travel to an alternative Doctor or clinic.

So I dicided to creat this charity. I am not alone in curing disease with alternative medicine, the numbers are vast and growing every day, as alternative medicine is becoming more main stream.

It is byond measure how many people could benefit from this financial aid.

Myself and the team of alternative Doctors I work with (many of whom were first conventional western medicine doctors, who learned and moved over to alternantive medicine, discouraged with the very low cure rate of chemo. and surgery, it's argued now of anywhere between 3 to 30 %), have been approched by an alarming amount of stage 4 cancer patients resently.

  These funds will provide:

  Consultation and treatment fees with alternative doctors.

  Provison of nessisary supplemts, juicers, alkinised water (most cancers can't live in alkinine), orantic fruits and vegetables, ASEA. air purifiers if needed  Assistance with travel expences, if nessesary , to healing clinics.

 I'm told people like 'perks', so do I. So i've created some I hope you'll like. Especilly coming to Los Angeles and meeting parts of the healing team I've put together!

  If I don't reach my financial goal, that's O.K. What funds are raised will go to the people who need them.

Again, the impact of this charity is beyond measure at this time, but it feels good to me. A dear friend said to me just the other day, "your charity is like a 'cookie cutter' for more help to come' in the future". I hope so, and hope soon there will be more health insurance for alternantive medicine.

I know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • You can get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.

Thank you, so very much.

 J. Cynthia Brooks

story: <3

Für mehr Information auf Deutsch folge diesem Link
























1. WHAT IS NEVERLOSE AND WHAT IS POWUNITY?

NeverLose is the name of our product, an automated alarm system using Bluetooth technology. PowUnity is our brand and short for Powerful Community.

2. HOW EASY IS IT TO MOUNT NEVERLOSE ON SKIS AND SNOWBOARDS?

Mounting is so simple, it takes less than a minute! First you attach the baseplate to your skis or snowboard with an adhesive tape, provided in your NeverLose kit. Then you screw the alarm device onto the baseplate with the included torx wrench. Once activating NeverLose through a downloadable app on your smartphone (available from the Apple Store and Google Play) you are ready to go!

3. HOW WELL DOES NEVERLOSE WORK IN SNOW?

NeverLose has been designed to work in extreme winter conditions. It works flawlessly in temperatures ranging from -20°C to 40°C (-4°F - 104°F) and is certified IPX5 water resistant – this includes forceful impacts of snow.

4. HOW LOUD IS NEVERLOSE?

In Ski Finder mode, the NeverLose alarm makes a steady beeping sound at one second intervals to enable gear retrieval, audible even when hidden under snow. The Guard alarm was designed to attract others with a piercingly rapid ring. Measured from one meter in distance, this alarm reaches up to 96 dB at a frequency of 2.8 kHz. 

5. WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY NEVERLOSE?

If you have pre-ordered NeverLose, the first round of deliveries are expected to be made in December 2015/January 2016, just as ski season ramps up in the Northern Hemisphere.

6. HOW LONG WILL THE BATTERY LAST?

For most recreational skiers, NeverLose can operate for an entire season of use without needing a battery change. Bluetooth Smart version 4.1 is a power-conservative technology that uses the Bluetooth Low Energy standard. Each alarm device is powered by a standard CR2450 coin cell battery, available at any general retailer. NeverLose can stay in standby mode for potentially over 200 hours and the alarm can actively ring up to a total of 2 hours.

7. WILL THE GUARD ALARM START IF SOMEONE ACCIDENTALLY HITS MY SKIS AND THEY FALL OVER?

No, the Guard alarm will ring only if there is sustained movement for more than 5 seconds.

8. WHAT HAPPENS IF THE BATTERY ON MY SMARTPHONE DIES WHILE NEVERLOSE IS ACTIVATED?

NeverLose has a ‘knock’ feature to disable the Ski Finder alarm in case your cell phone battery dies. Users can preemptively use the app to generate a customized knocking pattern that will shut off the alarm devices once physically knocked on.

9. CAN I TRANSFER NEVERLOSE BETWEEN DIFFERENT SETS OF SKIS?

Of course, you just have to attach a new pair of baseplates onto the other set of skis and screw the NeverLose alarms on. You are ready to shred powder.

10. CAN I REMOVE THE BASEPLATE AFTER IT HAS BEEN ATTACHED TO MY SKIS?

You can remove the baseplate adhesive by applying concentrated heat to the area. Otherwise it takes an exceptionally extreme force at an unusual angle to remove.

11. DO I GET A NOTIFICATION ON MY SMARTPHONE IF THE ALARM GOES OFF?

As soon as the alarm starts ringing, you will receive a notification on your smartphone if you are in range (up to 40 meters away from the alarm itself). If you are not in range, the alarm will still work as described to deter unauthorized access.

12. WHERE HAS NEVERLOSE BEEN DEVELOPED?

Most of the product development for NeverLose has been done in Sweden, where Bluetooth technology was invented. We work together with Swedish designers, tech gurus and consultant companies to develop the highest quality product possible!

13. IS NEVERLOSE WATERPROOF?

PowUnity is always expanding the product research and development of NeverLose, pushing its versatility to new limits. NeverLose has been certified IPX5 water resistant rating. This designation signifies that the alarm devices can withstand water propulsion from any direction, as well as melting snow.

14. WILL THE DEVICE INFLUENCE THE PERFORMANCE OF MY SKIS?

The compact and physically discreet construction of NeverLose provides minimal interference and versatile placement choice. Each physical alarm device measures in at 8.7 cm long (3.4″), 5.9 cm wide (2.3″) and 1.8 cm high (0.7″). Weighing only 35 grams (1.2 oz) without the detachable baseplate, the device can discreetly mount in many places of a user’s choosing on the deck of skis, snowboards and other sports equipment.

15. SHIPPING COSTS

Shipping costs – FREE shipping in USA, Canada, EU, Norway, Switzerland. Add 10$ for shipping to other countries. 

16. HOW SECURE IS THE BIKE LOCK?

The accompanying bike lock for NeverLose is currently being tested and our goal is to develop an ultimate solution with a high protection standards.

17. IS IT POSSIBLE TO ONLY USE THE NEVERLOSE ALARM WITHOUT THE ADDITIONAL MECHANICAL BIKE LOCK?

Definitely! If you want ultimate protection, use both solutions. If you need to protect your bike for a shorter period of time, then you can feel secure solely relying on the NeverLose alarm feature.

18. DOES NEVERLOSE INTERFERE WITH AVALANCHE TRANSCEIVERS?
No, it does not since it is using completely different frequency. 

19. WHERE ARE YOUR HEADQUARTERS?

Our HQ is in Innsbruck, Austria, nestled in the heart of the Alps. You are always welcome to stop by!

20. HOW CAN I CONTACT THE POWUNITY TEAM?

We have two support email contacts that you can reach out to at anytime:

neverlose@powunity.com (for English speaking people) and service@powunity.com (for German speaking people)

story:
Hi My name is Ash

 Long time mountainbiker and dirt jumper/trailbuilder.
I have been riding bikes since a young age but over the past 10 years taking to the extreme side... 
Dirt jump/freeride... Street and so on
I have run my own cycle shop for a short time and organized a some local projects and displays.
So now I live my days offering great cycle experiences at a low cost.
I'm not interested in making a lot of money and I love making people happy.
 So I want to ask for help because we cant get funding or land from the government and there is people calling for cycling facilities like this.

We have 11000 square meters of old farm land... Perfect digging material. But we need help to finish the project and to put in some new installments... 

In the photo above we have more land on the other side of the road but that is what we have started with. We can go into the forest too.

 We would like use the funding to pay for help with a workforce, one machine. Then install toilet, small snack house and maintenance school workshop. 

 This will be created for all ages, pump tracks small to large jumps, Rock gardens, wood features and training areas like switchbacks plus a foam pit.

 This will be a great place to come all year round and learn biking tricks and techniques.
 This is another place that helps to keep spreading the love for cycling and its knowledge. Families can come from afar.. and in this local community gave a better connection.


What We Need & What You Get

The funding will go to machine hire around 1500 euros

3000 euros towards amenities

3000 towards construction materials like wood work

and the rest to give to the workforce that helps because I have found no volunteers

 Perks will include access to facility

Accomodation when on holiday

Guided riding outside of the facility

and a few barbeques

The Impact

We are sharing the knowledge of a new low cost location to holiday with your bike. We don't strive for profit but want to offer great facilities and the opportunity for younger riders to gain experience in travelling on a low budget

 People are looking for a little change and may not have the funds to travel to exotic places.. Or want to travel for a long time.

 I have been riding and building for many years with and with out friends and we can make something cool and exciting for every one from pro to beginner.

story:
What We Need

Hi,

I am Warren, the head coach of Terra Linda HS Track and Field.  We are trying to raise $10,000 to purchase an Automatic Timing System for our Track facility.  When we hit our goal, we'll be the first school in Marin County with electronic timing, something that has been the standard in track and field for decades.  Of the many investments that will directly benefit our student-athletes, this timing system is our most immediate need.

The Impact

Funding for schools is scarce.  Each year, with the help of parents, students, and boosters we are able to close the gap between what the school gives us and what we need to run a track program.  But that help only covers the basics of a track season, it doesn't cover the big items, like modernizing facilities or replacing expensive equipment.  Rather than just get by year after year, as we have been doing, we are asking for your help to make our program not just good, but great.  If we want to encourage excellence in our student athletes, we must offer them a program that matches their hardwork and dedication. Your donation will help us achieve excellence.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign with your friends, co-workers, and family.  The more widespread our efforts, the better chance we have of giving these athletes the program they deserve.


Thank you for your help,


Warren Lanier

story:
Help Durango's Top Radio Stations Raise Funds for Adaptive Sports Association

Join 99X - Durango's Hit Music Station, KDGO 1240AM/98.3FM - Durango's News/Talk and 92.9 The Point - Durango's Best Variety as we raise funds to support Adaptive Sports Association.  This organization provides programs that enrich and transform the lives of people with disabilities through sports and recreation. By working with students to overcome physical and cognitive challenges in a supportive environment, ASA helps students “Explore Possibilities.”

With your help, we will ensure Adaptive Sports Association has the resources to keep these great programs running!

story:
Nora is officially in RECOVERY from brain surgery!!! 

The Boileau/Morrison clan has been absolutely overwhelmed with the out pour of support from our friends, family, and community, and for that WE THANK YOU from the bitty-bottomest of our hearty hearts.

On Thursday January 29th The Tofino Brewery Company hosted a Trivia Night fundraiser with lots of opportunities to stretch out your brain,  drink good beer, and share good times with loved ones.
With the help of our outstanding community, $1,070 was raised in one night! We are absolutely gobsmacked by this and 100% of the funds will be going towards Nora's mother having to take time off of work to care for Nora, along with travel costs of the numerous appointments that take place in Victoria and Nanaimo. 

The arbitrary goal of $1000 (which was completely NOT expected to be reached) has officially been reached in a mere 4 DAYS!!! You guys are outstanding.

The campaign will remain open for a short while longer, just in case!

Once again, thank you so so SO MUCH!!!

story:
Fly-crazy-wheels!  Maybe it's a flying frisby. No!  For those who don't know,  think of  a massive spinning disk with lots of momentum; spinning very, very fast like at jet engine speeds but in a vacuum. Lot's of energy stored to be converted back to electricity. Flywheels have a long, proven history. New technology advances make flywheel energy storage the best choice for storing electrical energy. 

Think "flywheel batteries" when in your home or office and your power goes off. All energy sources are subject to power spikes, dips and outages. These problems need to be solved and energy storage is the most efficient means to accomplish this. The most common energy storage used are batteries which are toxic, flammable, and have a short life.  Flywheel batteries's don't have any these drawbacks.

Think "flywheel batteries" when you think solar power.

The New York State Energy Research Development Agency (NYSERDA) supports our new technology by awarding us several grants which validated our technology in the proof-of-concept prototype. We have potential customers that want to see a demo now and NYSERDA will help us after a customer shows intent to buy.  


We need your help  to bridge this gap and demonstrate the prototype and show off it's advantages by making it transportable, shipping it, develop the technology further, and market it to new customers.  

Donate now to make a better tomorrow,  Donate to eliminate toxic chemical batteries. Donate as little as $5 or $10, or $25. This is our legacy. If you know people who are concerned about eliminating toxic chemicals from the environment, ask them to help us.

Our technological advances make flywheel energy storage very attractive. Now is the time to get behind ESS's flywheel battery. New markets are opening up now! 


Think "Flywheel Battery" when you see an elevator!


If you are in your apartment building or office building in-between the 10th and 11th floor and the power went out, you would have to wait for the Fire Department to get you out if there isn't a back-up system. You cannot put batteries in an elevator shafts for the above obvious reasons. However if you had our flywheel as a back-up, the elevator would safely take you to the closest landing or ground floor. There are 60,000 elevators in NYC alone, not counting the rest of the world.

ESS's flywheel makes more energy available than competitors flywheel's plus low cost, no-maintenance and long life through the use of our patented bearings and low loss reluctance motor.

ESS’s flywheel system is projected to have an energy density that is very competitive to lithium ion battery packs, which is the current state-of-the-art in batteries.

We have customers that want to see a demo in their facilities. We need your help to make our laboratory model transportable to customers and demonstrate all the Green features and all the economical advantages of our flywheel. We would very much appreciate all your help. Please  talk to all your friends, neighbors and relatives about us.

We do all of this because it's more than important to keep our Earth clean and safe for all or us and for all of our children and our children's children. We all live on this world without borders, suspended around our Sun in the endlessness of space.. We are just a small dot in this vast cosmic arena, and our Earth is the only world known so far to harbor life. There is nowhere else to which our species could migrate in the immediate future. and no one to bail us out.  It is all a matter of survival, and we all know what we have to do, so let's just do it before its too late!!

We need these funds to make our laboratory flywheel battery transportable and ship it to customers for demos. Also we have new technology ideas that will improve the flywheel's performance that need to be developed.

  1. $75,000 to make laboratory flywheel transportable
  2. $40,000 ship to several customers
  3. $50,000 develop new technology
  4. $35,000 to market to new customers


Energy Storage Solutions is an exciting start-up company that has developed very new eco-friendly flywheel battery (What is a flywheel battery?). Our flywheel batteries are robust, non-chemical, non-toxic, non-flammable totally Green battery. We have developed our flywheel with the help of seasoned engineers and a development team with backgrounds from MIT, Texas A&M and the University of Toronto. We have received three grants from New York State Energy Research Development Agency (NYSERDA) for this work and have developed a working prototype in Ottawa, Canada. 

We have demonstrated our 1kWh (Kilo Watt Hour) flywheel in front of a major corporation and received much excitement. Our flywheel is 24 In. in diameter and 16 in. high. We now have customers that want to see a demo in their facilities. For this reason, we now need your money to bring this working prototype to all our potential customers.

Renewable energy sources like solar, wind, regenerative breaking cannot provide continuous energy or energy upon demand or follow a variable energy load. That's where energy storage comes in, making those energy sources more affordable and efficient. The most common storage is chemical batteries like lithium-ion, lead-acid. Chemical batteries have many drawbacks such as being made of toxic materials that pollute the environment and generate flammable gasses and have a short life span. ESS's flywheel battery has exciting new technologies that makes it the most environmentally friendly and much more efficient. This is done  by using our unique low friction, no-maintenance bearing technology and our unique motor that does not use any 'rare earth' materials that come from outright political and economically hostile areas around the globe.

With the help of three New York State Energy Research Development Agency (NYSERDA) grants, we completed demonstration of our new technologies with a 1kWh(Kilo Watt Hour) flywheel shown below.  We have customers that want to see a demo in their facilities. We need your help to make the laboratory model transportable to customers and demonstrate the Green features and economical advantages of our flywheel. NYSERDA has said that they will help with designing a new larger 10kWh system but we need to get our existing system out to customers. If you can not contribute perhaps there are people you know who would be interested. Please let them know. 

Testing Lab


  Testing Team



Rendering of our larger 10kWh flywheel battery 6ft high cabinet.


Interested Customers – With Your Funding Help We Can Build Our Ideal Prototype and Show it to:

  • Singapore recently invited us to propose a demonstration project.
  • New York City Dept of Citywide Services(DCAS) has expressed interest to evaluate our flywheel battery system.
  • Thyssen-Krupp elevators saw a demonstration and requested a proposal to evaluate our system.
  • University of Rochester, Galissano Institute expressed interest to evaluate our system.
  • Syracuse University expressed interest to evaluate our system.
  • New York Power Authority expressed interest to evaluate our system.

Like us on facebook.   
Visit our web site:
 http://www.ess-epowervault.com/

 

Perks:

We want to thank you for helping make our dream a reality, We are offering some perks we hope you will enjoy. We find that our supporters love to help spread the word about Energy Storage Solutions. 

We'll ship all items free of charge

For the $5, a thank you note, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!
For the $10, a thank you certificate will be emailed to you, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!
For the $25, you have four choices, 'Out to lunch 6 pack insulated bag' perk, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!



For the $25, you have four choices, 'Grocery tote' perk, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!



For the $25, you have four choices,       Oz Blue Monday Travel Tumbler' perk, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!



For the $25 you have four choices,       '3 LED Metal Flashlight' perk, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!



For the $50 'Multi Tool Flashlight' perk, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!

Four white lights and Red flashing light function

Thumb-slide power/function switch

Stainless steel knife, bottle opener, nail file, flat head screwdriver with hexagon wrench,fish scaler/hook  remover, punch,saw blade/serrated knife,can opener and scissors. 


For the $100 we provide
Multi Tool Flashlight,
Oz Blue Monday Travel Tumbler,
Grocery Tote

please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!


About Us:

 ESS is a New York 'C' corp founded in 2011 by the below three founders, they are only shareholders. ESS is an IP, technology integrator, marketing and sales company that contracts out design, manufacturing and testing. ESS is located in New York. ESS uses 'lean manufacturing' to control costs.

We have assembled a strong team to bring the first product to market in a cost efficient and timely manner. ESS has been contracted with seasoned engineering and development  team from MIT, Texas A&M and the University of Toronto for our next generation system.



Our founders:

Paul Albert: CEO financial executive with over 35 years on Wall Street. Traded on the floor of the NYSE, ASE, and was a NASDAQ market maker He helped develop one of the first direct access trading systems (ETNs) now used extensively by all major stock exchanges around the world. 

Richard Johnston: COO Electrical Engineer with a Masters in Engineering Management. He has over 30 years of experience in product development and project management. 

Richard Dinsmore: Director of Sales, He has over fifteen years experience in marketing and strategic sourcing.
story_txt:
Fly-crazy-wheels!  Maybe it's a flying frisby. No!  For those who don't know,  think of  a massive spinning disk with lots of momentum; spinning very, very fast like at jet engine speeds but in a vacuum. Lot's of energy stored to be converted back to electricity. Flywheels have a long, proven history. New technology advances make flywheel energy storage the best choice for storing electrical energy. Think "flywheel batteries" when in your home or office and your power goes off. All energy sources are subject to power spikes, dips and outages. These problems need to be solved and energy storage is the most efficient means to accomplish this. The most common energy storage used are batteries which are toxic, flammable, and have a short life.  Flywheel batteries's don't have any these drawbacks.Think "flywheel batteries" when you think solar power.The New York State Energy Research Development Agency (NYSERDA) supports our new technology by awarding us several grants which validated our technology in the proof-of-concept prototype. We have potential customers that want to see a demo now and NYSERDA will help us after a customer shows intent to buy.  We need your help  to bridge this gap and demonstrate the prototype and show off it's advantages by making it transportable, shipping it, develop the technology further, and market it to new customers.  Donate now to make a better tomorrow,  Donate to eliminate toxic chemical batteries. Donate as little as $5 or $10, or $25. This is our legacy. If you know people who are concerned about eliminating toxic chemicals from the environment, ask them to help us.Our technological advances make flywheel energy storage very attractive. Now is the time to get behind ESS's flywheel battery. New markets are opening up now! Think "Flywheel Battery" when you see an elevator!If you are in your apartment building or office building in-between the 10th and 11th floor and the power went out, you would have to wait for the Fire Department to get you out if there isn't a back-up system. You cannot put batteries in an elevator shafts for the above obvious reasons. However if you had our flywheel as a back-up, the elevator would safely take you to the closest landing or ground floor. There are 60,000 elevators in NYC alone, not counting the rest of the world.ESS's flywheel makes more energy available than competitors flywheel's plus low cost, no-maintenance and long life through the use of our patented bearings and low loss reluctance motor.ESS’s flywheel system is projected to have an energy density that is very competitive to lithium ion battery packs, which is the current state-of-the-art in batteries.We have customers that want to see a demo in their facilities. We need your help to make our laboratory model transportable to customers and demonstrate all the Green features and all the economical advantages of our flywheel. We would very much appreciate all your help. Please  talk to all your friends, neighbors and relatives about us.We do all of this because it's more than important to keep our Earth clean and safe for all or us and for all of our children and our children's children. We all live on this world without borders, suspended around our Sun in the endlessness of space.. We are just a small dot in this vast cosmic arena, and our Earth is the only world known so far to harbor life. There is nowhere else to which our species could migrate in the immediate future. and no one to bail us out.  It is all a matter of survival, and we all know what we have to do, so let's just do it before its too late!!We need these funds to make our laboratory flywheel battery transportable and ship it to customers for demos. Also we have new technology ideas that will improve the flywheel's performance that need to be developed.
$75,000 to make laboratory flywheel transportable
$40,000 ship to several customers
$50,000 develop new technology
$35,000 to market to new customers

story:
Who We Are:

The Northwest Ohio Quarter Midget Racing Association is a not for profit club that provides kids from 5 to 16 the thrill of racing. Quarter Midget Racing is a family oriented sport that involves racing in specially prepared race cars. The cars, rules and safety procedures are designed specifically for kids and governed by the United States Auto Club (USAC). Quarter midgets race on oval tracks approximately 1/20 of a mile long. Children ages 5 to 16 years can race.  Safety features include full roll cages, multi-point seat harnesses, full face helmets, and other safety gear. Drivers race for trophies, there are no cash prizes awarded.

 In the 1960’s the club moved from Scott Park in Toledo to its current location at the Lucas County Recreation Center in Maumee. This facility is one of the finest in the nation. As host to several major events for the Quarter Midgets of America and the United States Auto Club, it has seen drivers from almost every state in the union. At one time QMA even considered using the facility, as its permanent location for their Grand Nationals. The track has always been lightning fast and is the perfect venue to showcase driver’s skills.

Former Northwest Ohio standouts who drove at the Maumee track include:

*  Ed Carpenter - Indy Cars
*  Rob Chaney - World of Outlaws & All Star Sprint Cars
*  Ryan Gillenwater - AVSS Sprint Cars
*  Jimmy Hettinger - USAC & ARCA Midgets- Hall of Famer
*  Anthony McCune - AVSS Sprint Cars
*  Jimmy McCune - AVSS & Must See Sprint Cars
*  Jeff Vrsek - ARCA & Main Event Outlaw Late Models

Some well known drivers who raced at our track as kids include:

*  Sarah Fisher-Indy Car 
*  Jeff Gordon-NASCAR 
*  Brad Keselowski-NASCAR
*  Michael Lewis-USAC 
*  John Nervo-USAC
*  Robbie Nervo-World of Outlaws 
*  Ryan Newman-NASCAR
*  Reed Sorenson-NASCAR

What We Need:

Here is what's up:

  • Our club has been at the Lucas County Recreation Center in Maumee, Ohio for over 50 years. The track has been repaved once, and concrete was poured in the corners but time and weather have taken a toll on the pavement and it is time to replace the track surface.
  • All funds raised will go toward track replacement. 

The Impact:

Quarter Midget racing is not a “drop off your kid” kind of sport, but a family sport.

  • Family members serve as pit crews, chief mechanics, scorers, timekeepers,      flaggers and corner workers.
  • Racing teaches the meaning of sportsmanship, fair play by following rules, how to be a good winner and a cious loser.
  • It develops coordination, and a sense of timing and independent thinking.
  • It teaches self-reliance.  Once a green flag has dropped, they are on their own.  
  • Development of knowledge and an appreciation for mechanical devices.
  • It teaches safe driving skills that are carried on in their teen years on the road.  Very few people develop the driving skill that these children acquire.  
  • It develops a sense of responsibility. 

It gives drivers a well-earned right and a sense of pride and accomplishment.  They stand taller and are more confident after becoming a proficient Quarter Midget Driver. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially to the new track, there are other ways you can help us meet our goal...

  • Share this campaign on your social media outlets - Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, you get the idea. Let people know what we're trying to do!
  • Use Indiegogo's share tools to help us get the word out!

story:
Attention!!! Important!

Before choose any SWES Dive light PERK please read OUR SPECIAL OFFER in the „Updates” section!


SWES Technology

Electricity from sea-water anywhere around the world, no charge, no maintenance – just put to the sea – light into the green future!!!

For the first time in the World we show SWES Technology on IndieGoGo campaign which is a new dimension in the field of alternative energy sources.

Sea Water Energy System (SWES) Technology means that it produces ready to use, clean and stable electric power from seawater in an environmentally friendly way.

Our first product is a high power LED SWES Dive Light which is unique to the world. It lights up as soon as touches seawater and lighting until it is in salt water.
The required energy to operate the dive light is provided by SWES Energy Cells which produces the basic electric power from seawater.

We have to trust that as technology develops for the human race, it will be an electric power source which feeds the required energy without harming the environment.

When we manage to gain this then it was worth the effort. 

We ask for your support to begin the serial production of the dive light and continue the development of SWES Technology.

Help us and be a part of changing the World! We can make our future better, brighter and cleaner together!

We appreciate every bit of support. If you like to help us achieving our goals but can not contribute, it is no problem! You can still support us with sharing our project in social media.
Thank you very much for your support!

Electricity from sea-water. Why is it important for our future?

We believe that the development of SWES Technology will make a better World.

Did you know?

  • Today over 100 thousand of ships and vessels are on the seas and oceans.
  • Vessels and ships are using fuel to give them electricity.
  • One vessel uses 150-250 tons of fuel per a day.
  • Vessels and ships are using 3-4 tons of fuels per day to have electricity on them.
  • From this 100-150 tons of contaminates are polluting the environment.
  • Our environment is directly polluted more than 10 million of tons contamination on every single day.
  • This contamination is one of the main reasons of acidity of seawater, which causes coral harms and so damages the whole food chain which affects our lives.

Unfortunately the list is endless we just collected some points to show the impact.

The SWES Energy Cell

The members of SWES group have been doing archeological deep-sea researching for 20 years furthermore working on development of different research equipment.
While we were working on the development of deep-sea research robot (ROV) we had an idea to have the necessary power-drive of the robot from its environment. This idea was the base of SWES Technology.

After having the concept we had been researching, developing, producing prototypes and testing for 4 years.

The basic electric power from seawater will be produced by SWES Energy Cell.

Development of the energy cell brought the achievement to the SWES Technology. Universities laboratories, engineers and institutes of environmental protection were instrumental in the development of SWES Technology.

Development of this part was the most important and the most difficult task.
One of the big challanges was that the used materials must be completely environmentally friendly as the energy cell has direct contact with the environment.

For today we are ready with three different energy cells implemented control panels. According to the needs of use we created 3,2VDC, 5VDC and 12 VDC systems –first in the world.

We are the one and only who could manage the separation of energy cells, which has made possible to build even more 100V units together. This step was mandatory to fulfill the needs of special places, which have more electricity usage, such as ships.


The First Product: High Power LED SWES Dive Light

Our first product is a dive light, light is not only for divers!

SWES Dive Light is unique to the world. The required energy to operate the dive light is provided by energy cells of SWES Technology.

                       

The SWES light is an extraordinary recourse for all

  • diver (skin divers, scuba divers, cave divers, deep divers, etc.)
  • sailor
  • fishermen
  • sport fishermen
  • boat and yacht owners
  • underwater photographer
  • aquatic fanatic
and everyone who loves the sea and wants to protect the environment.


Advantages and benefits

  • No battery and no charge needed. It is a perfect choice for sport and deep divers, cave and wreck divers, for sailors, for sport fishermen and for night fishing.
  • No maintenance needed. By 3-4 hours daily usage you should change the anode in 3-4 years.
  • Ready to use. As soon as it touches seawater, it lights up.
  • Completely environmentally friendly. All used materials and also the way, how energy cells produce energy are completely environmentally friendly.
  • Lightweight (945-965g)
  • Easy to handle.
  • Unique, massive, solid design.
  • Magnetic switch with in off & dry state
  • Without touching seawater, consistency never compromise.
Also in off & dry state,consistency is not compromised.

We produce two types of SWES dive light

SWES-1 Dive Light has one high power LED, SWES-3 has three high power LED. Both of them are tested until 100m depth.
   

1 High power LED SWES Dive Light

  • Voltage:  3,2 V
  • Power Source:  SWES Energy cells
  • LED color:    cool-white
  • Color temperature:  5000-8000K
  • Lumen:    cca. 100+
  • Lux:  11360 (0,5 m)
  • Lens:    Acryl 6-12°
  • Deep rating max.:  100 m tested
  • Weight:  945 g
  • Size:      D 80mm x L 230 mm
  • Switching System:  Rotary magnetic switch system

3 High power LED

  • Voltage:  3,2 V
  • Power Source:  SWES Energy cells
  • LED color:    cool-white
  • Color temperature:  5000-8000K
  • Lumen:    cca.300+
  • Lux:  33650 (0,5 m)
  • Lens:    Acryl 6-12°
  • Deep rating max.:  100 m tested
  • Weight:  965 g
  • Size:    D 80mm x L 230 mm
  • Switching System:  Rotary magnetic switch system

Would you like to be one of the firsts who has a seawater operated dive light?

During our IndieGoGo campaign all SWES-1 and SWES-3 dive lights  are produced with a unique 3D label if you order with Perk “Why not?”.

Surprise your family, lover, friend or colleagues with a personal labeled one and only gift!

                                  

                                                                     

SWES-1 and SWES-3 dive lights are working only in seawater or in salt water.Our technical development team is working on making it possible to use in fresh water also.
We found the solution and the realization is still in progress. Immediately when the stable model of fresh water light will be ready we will publish it on all forums.


Planned to develop - The SWES Vision

Light is just the beginning – a ship which does not harm the environment, quiet and cheap to maintain is our future.

An electric ship which is able to move as quiet and clean as a sailboat it is not a dream anymore.
Imagine a world where your ship does not need a tank of fuel, just get on board and you can go. Sail without polluting the environment.

For SWES Technology it does not matter having rain, wind, or sunshine. The SWES energy cell provides the necessary electric energy from the seawater all day and night long, independently from weather conditions.  Thanks to the electric energy your ship can go in the deepest silence and let you enjoy the unique experience while you’re shipping around the sounds of nature. 

Develop

We do not believe in miracles. We have confidence in ourselves and in our knowledge.

For us it was certainty one of the main directions of the development of SWES Technology will be the electric ship. As the energy is coming directly from the seawater itself the ships are not running on fuel.

We made the first steps already and we believe with supporters we can have all the possibilities to build the first prototype of SWES electric ship.

For an electric power-driven ship the needed energy level is higher than for a dive light. For our tests and examinations we prepared the first energy cell unit from 8pcs of 12VDC energy cells, which provides all together 96VDC of voltage.

8 pcs of 12VDC energy cells provide 96VDC which light up 64 pcs of Power LED.

With these tests we verified that the necessary energy level for ships can be produced by SWES energy cells.

The first period of development has two main phase.
  1. In the first phase a high voltage (540VDC) SWES energy cell RACK will be built and tested in laboratory.
  2. During the second phase we will build 4-6 RACKs and install these on a 6-8 meter length of ship and the RACKs will power-drive 2 pcs of out-board engine.

          

                             


According to our plan the first prototype will be ready for testing in the middle of 2015.


Amazing, special perks for your support

"Why not?"

SWES Dive Light with unique labels are prepared one by one so these require extra time and effort.
This Perk can be order for each SWES Dive light, but one Perk is valid only for one light. In case you need more than one unique labeled light you should order as many Perk’s as the number of lights you want to label. This can be a graphic logo, monogram, name of a company or anything in which is requested by you.

The label can have up to 6 characters; the label size is 38mm x 11mm.  The size of graphics and logos are 38mm x20mm. If you are interested in this offer, please send us the requested text of the label and font type. Please find more details at Perk.


We offer a really special possibility with “For clean ocean” Perk.

  • The supporter who chose this Perk will be selected by a draw, and you can win 1  all-inclusive journey to Hungary and to Croatia for 7 days, for 2 persons.
  • Every supporter of 250$ “For clean ocean” Perk will receive a beer mug (23-ounce)with the text “Every support of yours is one drop for the clean ocean.” and SWES logo where the Perk is, and of course can win 1  all-inclusive journey to Hungary and to Croatia for 7 days, for 2 persons.
  • The draw will be organized after the end of the campaign.
  • Every Perk donation is numbered and the draw will be based on these numbers.
  • The result of draw will be published on our homepage and all participants will be informed by social media.
  • Every brought Perk you purchase increases your chance to be the lucky one whom and whose partner is welcome by us.

During the first days of your visit next to sightseeing of Budapest you can meet the developers of SWES technology and can have insight into the work of our laboratory and you can see and try all prototypes of SWES technology.

After we travel to Croatia together you will participate on the first drive of SWES ship.

 Depending on the weather at the test location a traditional goulash party will be arranged in your honor.  The world famous goulash will be cooked according to the traditions by the members of the SWES Team.

Your visit and the tests will be filmed which will be published on our homepage.

During the tests the media will be present and as a supporter you can be involved in informing of media.

We will continue our work with the SWES technology electric power-drive ship which is able to go across the ocean, after the successful tests.


For developers

SWES Technology is our labor of love, our dream and our aim. Our goal is to have a wide range of SWES Technology usage. To fulfill we never stop researching of possible utilization areas.

If you have good ideas of utilization of SWES Technology, you have to know, our team is opened and curios, we are ready to read new ideas.

With buying of "Your idea" Perk for $19 you not only support our project but also ensure your future.

Our technician team will check all incoming ideas and suggestions!

In case your idea seems to be ready to realize then we will create a working model in cooperation with you. If it is possible we will send you a working model.

When a product is created based on your idea you will have the right for Royalty fees, which will be declared in an agreement with you.

Attention! Our decisions are also based in the order sequence of the Perk.


SWES Table Pendant - Unique LED sign for your table

                               


For the supporter of our campaign we planned and build a small presentation unit of SWES Technology. This unit perfectly demonstrates the working of SWES technology and also an attractive pendant on your working desk or in your home.

              

These units are handmade in our laboratory, so it is unique.

We build in a 3,2V SWES energy cell which will power-drive 3pcs of blue LED.

LEDs are lighting a water-clean plexi panel, sized 150mm x 100mm x 10mm, which is labeled with SWES Technology.

The pendant will work with 100 ml of seawater or the same quantity of salt water in a concentration of 3%.

SWES Table Pendant is a one and only promotion chance for your company. This is available only during the campaign!

Please send us the logo of your company or a text requested by you. We will plan a SWES Table Pendant in cooperation with you, and we will make it real for you. These special labeled SWES Table Pendants will be texted by SWES Technology on the first panel of the energy cell; your label will be lighted by the LEDs.


The Team Behind the Development


The rollout plan


Further PERKS

For the $5 thank you perk, please provide us with your name or organization. Thanks!

We'll ship all items free of charge.

Local tax and customs costs not included.

                                       

                                   


                                      

 

                                    


                                 



About us

Everyone has past and present – and everybody can have a future.

Our past we worked in deep-sea research, this is where we met a lot of people committed to oceans, technology and green living.

The members of SWES group have been doing archeological deep-sea researching for 20 years furthermore working on development of different research equipment. Up to now 9 scientific expeditions in 7 countries were organized and lead by us, and many other instrumental research were realized.


During our work we discovered more than 100 historical wrecks and 2000 year-old sank city, additionally we helped the authorities to investigate in different crimes and find bombs and explosives from World War ll. From our results more than hundreds of written and tele media reported and we arranged more successful museum exhibition.

For more information please click on www.deepresearch.hu

Today our first priority is to start serial producing of the SWES Dive light and finish the prototype of SWES Ship.

Today a drop  - tomorrow drops will become a sea.

In the future lot of possibilities are waiting for us – we researched for footprints of our past in the depth of the ocean and found a future opportunity in electric power resources.


Risk and challenges

We have challenges to help finding better ways to build perfect products.

So we often risk. 

And our products are safe – even working with electricity under water.

Our products are assembled with electric shock protection and accident protection.


FAQs

Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

For all destinations, please add the amount specified in the perk description. Local import taxes may apply.

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

Email the IndieGoGo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

What kind of sea-water will be fine for the light?

All around the world and an all lakes where the salt content is over 0, 9%.

Will the ship first way opened?

Unfortunately everybody can not join, we have perks where an all-inclusive journey can be won, otherwise only invited can participate. Certainly our results will be published on our website,

What if we fail to reach the funding target?

We appreciate every bit of support we receive during the 40 days, and every backer will be welcomed into the SWES technology. If we don’t reach our target then we will focus only on dive light production and small SWES devices (black box for ships), and later on we will start a new campaign or form from the revenue of the light and we will continue working on the ship.

What if my question isn’t answered here?

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the SWES Technology, the IndieGoGo campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us:

support@swestechnology.com


Featured in the Press
story_txt:
Attention!!! Important!
Before choose any SWES Dive light PERK please read OUR SPECIAL OFFER in the „Updates” section!
SWES Technology
Electricity from sea-water anywhere
around the world, no charge, no maintenance – just put to the sea – light into
the green future!!!


For the first time in the World we
show SWES Technology on IndieGoGo campaign which is a new dimension in the field of alternative energy sources.
Sea Water Energy System (SWES) Technology means that it produces ready to use, clean and stable electric power from seawater in an environmentally friendly way. 
Our first product is a high power LED SWES Dive Light which is unique to the world. It lights up as soon as touches seawater and lighting until it is in salt water.
  The required energy to operate the dive light is provided by SWES Energy Cells which produces the basic electric power from seawater. 
  We have to trust that as technology develops for the human race, it will be an electric power source which feeds the required energy without harming the environment.
When we manage to gain this then it was worth the effort. 

We ask for your support to begin the serial production of the dive light and continue the development of SWES Technology. 
Help us and be a part of changing the World! We can make our future better, brighter and cleaner together!

We appreciate every bit of support. If you like to help us achieving our goals but can not contribute, it is no problem! You can still support us with sharing our project in social media.Thank you very much for your support!

Electricity from sea-water. Why is it important for our future?
We believe that the development of SWES Technology will make a better
  World.
Did you know?

Today over 100 thousand of ships and vessels are on the seas and oceans.
Vessels and ships are using fuel to give them electricity.
One vessel uses 150-250 tons of fuel per a day.
Vessels and ships are using 3-4 tons of fuels per day to have electricity on them.
From this 100-150 tons of contaminates are polluting the environment.
Our environment is directly polluted more than 10 million of tons contamination on every single day.
This contamination is one of the main reasons of acidity of seawater, which causes coral harms and so damages the whole food chain which affects our lives.

Unfortunately the list is endless we just collected some points to show the impact.
The  SWES Energy Cell
The members of SWES group have been doing archeological deep-sea researching for 20 years furthermore working on development of different research equipment.While we were working on the development of deep-sea research robot (ROV) we had an idea to have the necessary power-drive of the robot from its environment. This idea was the base of SWES Technology. 
After having the concept we had been researching, developing, producing prototypes and testing for 4 years.
The basic electric power from seawater will be produced by SWES Energy Cell. 

Development of the energy cell brought the achievement to the SWES Technology. Universities laboratories, engineers and institutes of environmental protection were instrumental in the development of SWES Technology.
Development of this part was the most important and the most difficult task. One of the big challanges was that the used materials must be completely environmentally friendly as the energy cell has direct contact with the environment.

For today we are ready with three different energy cells implemented control panels. According to the needs of
use we created 3,2VDC, 5VDC and 12 VDC systems –first in the world.
We are the one and only who could
manage the separation of energy cells, which has made possible to build even more
100V units together. This step was mandatory to fulfill the needs of special
places, which have more electricity usage, such as ships.
The First Product:  High Power LED SWES Dive Light
Our first product  is a dive light, light is not only for divers!
SWES Dive Light is unique to the world. The required
energy to operate the dive light is provided by energy cells of SWES
Technology.
                       
The SWES light is an extraordinary recourse for all


diver (skin divers, scuba divers, cave divers, deep divers, etc.)
sailor
fishermen
sport fishermen
boat and yacht owners
underwater photographer
aquatic fanatic

and everyone who loves the sea and wants to protect the environment.

Advantages and benefits


No battery and no charge needed. It is  a perfect choice for sport and deep divers, cave  and wreck divers, for sailors, for sport fishermen and for night fishing.

No maintenance needed. By 3-4 hours daily  usage you should change the anode in 3-4 years.

Ready to use. As soon as it touches seawater,  it lights up.

Completely environmentally friendly. All used  materials and also the way, how energy cells  produce energy are completely environmentally friendly. 
Lightweight (945-965g)
Easy to handle.
Unique, massive, solid design.
Magnetic switch with in off & dry state
Without touching seawater, consistency never compromise.

Also in off & dry state,consistency is not compromised.
We produce two types of SWES dive light 
SWES-1 Dive Light has one high power LED, SWES-3 has three high power LED.
Both of them are tested until 100m depth.
   1 High power LED SWES Dive Light




Voltage:  3,2 V
Power Source:  SWES Energy cells
LED color:    cool-white
Color temperature:  5000-8000K
Lumen:    cca. 100+
Lux:  11360 (0,5 m)
Lens:    Acryl 6-12°
Deep rating max.:  100 m tested
Weight:  945 g
Size:      D 80mm x L 230 mm
Switching System:  Rotary magnetic switch system

3 High power LED




Voltage:  3,2 V
Power Source:  SWES Energy cells
LED color:    cool-white
Color temperature:  5000-8000K
Lumen:    cca.300+
Lux:  33650 (0,5 m)
Lens:    Acryl 6-12°
Deep rating max.:  100 m tested
Weight:  965 g
Size:    D 80mm x L 230 mm
Switching System:  Rotary magnetic switch system

Would you like to be one of the firsts who has a seawater operated dive light?
During our IndieGoGo campaign all SWES-1 and SWES-3 dive lights  are produced with a unique 3D label if you order with Perk “Why not?”.
Surprise your family, lover, friend or colleagues with a personal labeled one and only gift!




                                  

                                                                       
SWES-1 and SWES-3 dive lights are working only in seawater or in salt water.Our technical development team is working on making it possible to use in fresh water also.We found the solution and the realization is still in progress. Immediately when the stable model of fresh water light will be ready we will publish it on all forums.
Planned to develop - The SWES Vision
Light is just the beginning – a ship which does not harm the environment, quiet and cheap to maintain is our future.
An electric ship which is able to move as quiet and clean as a sailboat it is not a dream anymore.Imagine a world where your ship does not need a tank of fuel, just get on board and you can go. Sail without polluting the environment. 
For SWES Technology it does not matter having rain, wind, or sunshine. The SWES energy cell provides the necessary electric energy from the seawater all day and night long, independently from weather conditions.  Thanks to the electric energy your ship can go in the deepest silence and let you enjoy the unique experience while you’re shipping around the sounds of nature.  
Develop
We do not believe in miracles. We have confidence in ourselves and in our knowledge.
For us it was certainty one of the main directions of the development of SWES Technology will be the electric ship. As the energy is coming directly from the seawater itself the ships are not running on fuel.
We made the first steps already and we believe with supporters we can have all the possibilities to build the first prototype of SWES electric ship.
For an electric power-driven ship the needed energy level is higher than for a dive light. For our tests and examinations we prepared the first energy cell unit from 8pcs of 12VDC energy cells, which provides all together 96VDC of voltage.

8 pcs of 12VDC energy cells provide 96VDC which light up 64 pcs of Power LED.
With these tests we verified that the necessary energy level for ships can be produced by SWES energy cells.
The first period of development has two main phase.

In the first phase a high voltage
(540VDC) SWES energy cell RACK will be built and tested in laboratory. 
During the second phase we will build 4-6 RACKs and install these on a 6-8 meter length of ship and the RACKs will power-drive 2 pcs of out-board engine.

          
                             
According to our plan the first prototype will be ready for testing in the middle of 2015.
Amazing, special perks for your support
"Why not?"
SWES Dive Light with unique labels are prepared one by one so these require extra time and effort. 
  This Perk can be order for each SWES Dive light, but one Perk is valid only for one light. In case you need more than one unique labeled light you should order as many Perk’s as the number of lights you want to label. This can be a graphic logo, monogram, name of a company or anything in which is requested by you. 
The label can have up to 6 characters; the label size is 38mm x 11mm.  The size of graphics and logos are 38mm x20mm. If you are interested in this offer, please send us the requested text of the label and font type. Please find more details at Perk.
We offer a really special possibility with “For clean ocean” Perk.

The supporter who chose this Perk will be selected by a draw, and you can win 1  all-inclusive journey to Hungary and to Croatia for 7 days, for 2 persons.
Every supporter of 250$ “For clean ocean” Perk will receive a beer mug (23-ounce)with the text “Every support of yours is one drop for the clean ocean.” and
SWES logo where the Perk is, and of course can win 1  all-inclusive journey to Hungary and to Croatia for 7 days, for 2 persons.
The draw will be organized after the end of the campaign.
Every Perk donation is numbered and the draw will be based on these numbers.

The result of draw will be published on our homepage and all participants will be informed by social media.
Every brought Perk you purchase increases your chance to be the lucky one whom and whose partner is welcome by us.

Your visit and the tests will be filmed which will be published on our homepage. 
During the tests the media will be present and as a supporter you can be involved in informing of media.
We will continue our work with the SWES technology electric power-drive ship which is able to go across the ocean, after the successful tests.

story: On Saturday 5/23, I went on a camping trip with my close friends for Memorial Day. Around 5 AM on Sunday morning, I was the victim of a vicious Hate Crime when two boys jumped me for allegedly taking advantage of a drunken party member. As many of you know, I would never hurt a fly. They used this as an excuse to beat me up for being a homosexual. As a result of the beating, I suffered a concussion and had numerous seizures. My nose broken. My glasses were busted beyond repair. My two front teeth are badly damaged. Now, I am left with huge Emergency Room bills, I have to pay outrageous dental surgery feeds, I have to pay for a completely new pair of glasses, and I will likely accrue enormous legal fees as a result of something that is not my fault whatsoever. I cannot afford Health Insurance, and I do not qualify for Medicaid. Please help me get my life on track by donating anything you possibly can! Pennies add up, and anything you could do to contribute would be massively appreciated! They may have broken my body, but not my spirit. Please help me feel beautiful again.

story:
About Taylor and her Fight!

Taylor, a student at Winlock Middle School, must put her summer on hold while she travels to Children’s Hospital in Philadelphia, PA to receive Proton Beam Therapy for 10 weeks for her Ganglioglioma Tumor in her left temporal lobe. This is her third battle with a brain tumor, and she has had two previous resection surgeries in November of 2005 and October of 2010.  A resection surgery is not an option at this time as there would be too much damage to the healthy brain.

Says Karen, Taylor’s mother, “Taylor is a special young lady who just wants more than anything to be like other kids, not the tumor girl she has been tagged…we are hoping and praying that this is the treatment that we need to get this behind us once and for all.”

Taylor is a budding artist who loves to doodle and draw.  She was able to play a sport for the first time this past year and is looking forward to her second chance to play basketball when the season begins this year.   There are not enough words to describe the awesome impact Taylor has on anyone she meets.   She is positive and strong even when battling these brain tumors.    "Don't Quit Keep Fighting!" has become her motto.  

How can YOU help?

  • Donate to this great young lady and her family to help allievate some of the burden and stress as they are trying to focus on treatment.
  • Taylor and her mom are in Philadelphia, PA receiving Proton Beam Therapy for Taylor's Ganglioglioma Tumor in her left temporal lobe.   Her mother is unable to work while they are in Philadelphia receiving treatment.  All the funds are going to support the family and their needs at this time. 
  • Taylor picked out the phrase and colors of the bracelets, "Don't Quit Keep Fighting, TMR!"
  • All funds are going to support the family with all expenses they are incurring while receiving treatment.

The Impact

Taylor and her family have never asked for help and we had to persuade them to allow us to assist with some of the financial burden.  We held a silent auction and concert right after she left for her Proton Beam Therapy treatment and were able to raise $3,800.   Every little bit helps to allievate some of the stress that mom and Taylor are feeling.  We want them to focus on her therapy, not whether they will have the money to cover all the costs.    Taylor deserves a chance to shine for a long time in this world.  She will bring a lot of positives and smiles today and in her future endeavors.  Please help give to Taylor and let her feel the support we all have for her!

Other donations and Support!

We know that not everyone can help with a monetary donation, however prayers and positive thoughts go a long way as well.  Thank you!!! Taylor's family appreciates all of your thoughts, and well wishes during this time. We all know that the love, support, and prayers through Taylor's battle and recovery are incalculable.  Feel free to leave a comment on this site or Taylor's Facebook page.

  • Monetary donations are also being accepted at any Sterling Bank under the name Taylor Rehmeyer.

    You can follow our efforts at http://www.facebook.com/UltimateTaylorRehmeyerSupportGroup?ref=hl

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools and help us get the word out to help this family in need!

Words from Taylor's Mom!

 Karen (Taylor's Mom)
http://www.indiegogo.com/taylorfund?a=945282 I challenge anyone who has not donated to donate just one dollar and then share this link... over 700000 dollars was raised for a school monitor bullied one day on film the way my daughter has been taunted by her peers for years. even as recent as three days ago Taylor and I were attacked ruthlessly by a teen girl via the net and phone.  I have never asked for help until now and only because I am desperate financially AND Taylor NEEDS to see the support... you have no idea of how low her spirits are.  The end of radiation is just another side trip on our journey... Taylor will need constant treatment for the rest of her life since she has had two relapses so far........ please help us?????

Words from Taylor's Mom!
 Karen (Taylor's Mom)

http://www.indiegogo.com/taylorfund?a=945282 I challenge anyone who has not donated to donate just one dollar and then share this link... over 700000 dollars was raised for a school monitor bullied one day on film the way my daughter has been taunted by her peers for years. even as recent as three days ago Taylor and I were attacked ruthlessly by a teen girl via the net and phone.  I have never asked for help until now and only because I am desperate financially AND Taylor NEEDS to see the support... you have no idea of how low her spirits are.  The end of radiation is just another side trip on our journey... Taylor will need constant treatment for the rest of her life since she has had two relapses so far........ please help us?????

story:
Short Summary

My name is Matthew and I am a OEF/OIF Veteran who was an avionics technician who also graduated as a United States Aircrewman and Search and Rescue Swimmer. I was a deployed service member four times from the year 2004 to 2008.The stress of being deployed in the middle east or worldwide away from my family and everything I loved was tough. Every time I had the chance of liberty (free time abroad) I booked a round of golf and the relaxation felt nearly as good as home. I want to spread the relief and relaxation to the thousand of service members, newly seperated veterans, and wounded warriors of the valley of the sun. My goal is to raise enough to pay for one twosome round a week and create a new story 52 times over the next year.You will feel fantastic honoring our nations heroes. From what I have expierienced giving back to the veterans and service members gives you a great feeling that lasts a lifetime. Help me achive these rounds for heroes and I will cap the year off with an inspirational short film including pictures, thank you's, as well as a 16 man tournament with a share of the donations and a new set of clubs going to the veteran / service member with the lowest score.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I need enough to fund;

  • 52 rounds of golf in the best courses Arizona has to offer
  • A refreshed set of clubs (right now I have 3 sets) 2 men , 1 womens. I would love to fund a new set for the Vets to hack away with.
  • 52 dozen golf balls - Pinnacle Folds of Honor (They give back as well )
  • 1,000 tees
  • Golf Refreshments

If I do not reach my entire goal 100% of funds will still be spent providing free rounds of golf for veterans, or sending golf equipment to the USO abroad for deployed service members to use. None of the funds will be used for personal profit or gain just golf and transportation if needed.

 

The Impact

Golf has proven to be a very spiritual and relaxing sport and I have personally read of many rehabing veterans using Golf as an escape for Post Traumatic Stress Disorder or coping with the reality of life outside the service. I have met many veterans at the VA hospital locally and explained my goals, and they have always been warmly welcomed. I will have postings with sign ups for tee times at the Veterans Affairs hospital , Luke Air Base, and the metro phoenix recruiting stations.  Every round will have a photo posted to the wall of my facebook page www.facebook.com/GolfForeHeroes with a special thank you to all that donated. This is a no nonsense fundraiser that will give back to our Nations Heroes and I appreciate all of you for even taking the time to read this.

 100% of everything earned will go to Veterans, Wounded Warriors, and Service members.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please use the IndieGoGo tools to share this with all your friends even if you choose not to donate. We appreciate your time, thanks for reading.

story:
We are hosting a public screening of "The Power of Two" at The Palm Theatre in downtown San Luis Obispo, CA on Friday, November 16th at 7pm! 

Not only award winning, empowering, and educational, this showing is also a fundraiser for the non-profit Children's Organ Transplant Association (COTA) on behalf of Dustin Lucas who is awaiting a double lung transplant.

Help us raise money to cover the screening cost so 100% of ticket sales can go to COTA!

Compelling and evocative without being sentimental, The Power of Two, featuring and based on the true story of twin sisters Anabel Stenzel and Isabel Stenzel Byrnes, follows their efforts to each receive life-saving double lung transplants, as a result of being afflicted with Cystic Fibrosis.  The film shines a revealing and hopeful light on the plight of patients with genetic diseases, such as Cystic Fibrosis, who require organ transplants in order to defeat the inevitably life-shortening ravages of their diseases.

As did the Stenzel twins, Dustin Lucas now requires a double lung transplant in order to conquer and survive the degenerative effects of Cystic Fibrosis.  Dustin, a 25 year old resident of San Luis Obispo, and his family - father David Lucas, sister Amber Lucas, local mom Cheryl Lenhardt, all residents of SLO; and Northern California Mom, Gina Borquez - have teamed up with COTA, a national 501©(3) non-profit organization, to ensure that one hundred percent of all funds raised in honor of Dustin are used only for transplant-related expenses.  It is currently estimated that Dustin is facing $40,000 in out of pocket expenses attendant to his anticipated transplant surgery.

Visit www.COTAforDustinL.com for more information and events!

 

Thanks so much for your support!!!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

My name is Bethanie and I have struggled with several mental illnesses throught my life. I have been diagnosed with bipolar disorder, borderline personality disorder, and PTSD related to childhood trauma.

This campaign is to help me be able to get the mental healthcare that I so desperately need. I cannot afford insurance and all of my state insurance applications have been denied despite me meeting all of the criteria. Without assistance I will not be able to get the care that I need in order to be a functioning member of society, which I so desperately want to be.

Helping me get mental healthcare will drastically improve my quality of life, as well as the quality of life for my daughter. It is crucial that I stay on my medication so that I can be the best mother I can be and also a self-sustaining adult. Your contributions are invaluable to me as being able to afford and stay on my medication will help me to become a strong and independent person who can control my moods as opposed to having any little thing push me over the edge. I don't want to self harm anymore, I don't want to contemplate suicide daily and getting the care I need will make those thoughts diminish significantly. You really could be saving my life.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

I have set my funding goal for $500. My psychiatrist visits are $100 each and my medication comes out to around $230 each month. That's $330 a month to stay sane. I set it to $500 so that I would be able to afford a subsequent visit to my psychiatrist, and hopefully by that time my mental state will have improved enough that I can manage to afford the medication itself.

Despite my many mental illnesses, I am a very kind and fun loving person. I'm an artist and love to paint, draw and write. I'm currently working on my first book which will detail the trials and tribulations I have faced as a young girl in the 21st century. I am very passionate about feminism and helping others when I can. This is my cry for help, which is a bit hard for me as usually I just keep my needs to myself and hope I can handle myself for just awhile longer, though now I am realizing that I cannot do this alone.

If I don't reach my entire goal I will put what I do raise towards my psychiatric visits. I have opened a savings account just for this purpose. Any money pledged will go towards my mental healthcare and nothing else.

The Impact

I know that if I can get back on my meds and become stable I can be an invaluable member of society. I love volunteering and helping others and will do my best to pay it forward to those in need. This fund will also help me to become a better mother to my child who deserves the very best.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

I understand that there are some of you that can't help financially, but I would greatly appreciate it if you could help get the word out and share this wherever you deem appropriate.

I also appreciate words of encouragement and get well soon cards!

There's also this really great indiegogo share tool and that will help spread the word on my campaign! Utilize it if you feel so inclined, I would greatly appreciate it!

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this, and if you contribute please know how extremely grateful I will be!

story:
www.baktuli.com


Our Story

Baktuli is North America's first stylish towel line dedicated for athletics. Our products are made of 100% cotton which is soft on the skin and good for the environment. So far we have made colourful towels yoga that are body length and fit over the yoga mat. Our featured project for Indiegogo is a workout towel that you can take to the gym. This workout towel resembles a scarf and there is a hole in the middle of the towel so that it won't fall off your shoulders when exercising. We use an organic based anti-microbial from Microbanâ„¢ called Microban PB which is safe for use and EPA approved. 

The Impact

The Baktuli workout towel will stylize your experience at the gym and is very functional to your workout regime. The towel can be used when jogging, on a road bike, spinning, weights and pretty much every sport out there. It will help make your workouts and sporting events fun! 

What We Need & What You Get

A goal of $10,000 is required for a large run of this product, anything less and this project will be too expensive to produce in small quantities (while maintaining quality standards). When producing this product the yarn must be dyed in batches and woven together in a Jacquard weaving machine. As this towel is a unique size and cut, large minimums are required for production. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this project and brand, please like our Facebook page and contribute to the campaign. You can also share this link with friends who have a passion for style, exercise and well being. A small donation of $30 insures you a towel of your own. Larger donations can help your family's workout regime or benefit your retail store or studio by being the first to carry the Baktuli line!

story:
One Life Challenge

How many times have you wished you had the motivation to run a marathon, climb a mountain or participate in a 100 mile bike race? For some it’s once a year, for others it’s every decade, and for the great majority of us it seems to creep into our minds as we approach middle age; only to prove we are not quite over-the-hill. The truth is that most of us at some time in our lives have wondered if we still have it in us to complete such a challenge. The answer may not lie in whether we are in prime condition to complete such a task, but rather whether we can find the motivation to see it through.

Both of my sisters died from Cancer!

I am the lucky one!  I'm the sister that carries the light and the hope forward for the family. I accept that I am the one who was left behind to be the advocate for “SEND ME ON VACATION”, (www.sendmeonvacation.com).  My intention is  to honor the lives that my sisters lead before, during and after the challenges they faced dealing with cancer. They left me with an incredible gift to share with mankind. The challenges my sisters faced, what all cancer patients face,  are indescribable, yet every day they meet these obstacles with a brave heart.  When my sisters passed, I needed to turn the pain into something tangible...so I ran.  I ran until I couldn’t
run any longer. I got DVT (blood clot) from a band I put around my leg to help me with my running.  It took a year to get off the Warfarin (Coumadin) and again today, I run. Next month,  I am participating in a Triathlon. My goal is to raise enough money, through donations, to send a breast cancer survivor on a well deserved vacation in honor of my sisters. It  is a wonderful gift, and one I am so proud to be a part of.

Please sponsor me and contribute to my campaign! I'm participating in a Triathlon in
St. George, October 12, 2013.

Together, WE can make this dream come true.

With Hope,

Ericka June Turner

story: I am working to raise money to do my first triathlon; a challenge I never thought I could do.  I am always pitching to my clients; think positive, don't say never, your attitude can be your biggest barrier.  Well, time to practice what I am preaching.  My friend Jim and I are aiming to do our first triathlon together.   Knowing that most people train for this for weeks, we have been waking up at 5:30am every morning before our demanding jobs to train and hitting the gym after to get the bike/run done.  I think we both have the mental will power to do it.   The catch?  WHY help US?!  We are trying to raise an amount that far exceeds the entry fees in hopes to purchase every day hygiene products to donate to those in need (such as tooth brushes, tooth paste, body soap, deodorant ... you know things we often take for granted).

story:
Our project:

Earscanner is the name of a small device constructed by  joining two parts with a mirror positioned in the middle and protected by two pieces of glass. The user can view the inner part of the ear in front of a bathroom mirror. Anyone can check the hygenic status of their ear and find any residues that need to be removed.


Why:

Before an important event, meeting lots of people or just for extra confidence... Check your ear!

What we need:

With a small investment primarily directed at the construction of an injection mold for the plastic we will be able to create an object intended for a wider public. thanks to its natural simplicity and quick use the device could find a place in everyone's home.

Perks:

In exchange for your support you will receive one of the items

Once we have reached our goal all the devices will be sent out to the backers in a few weeks!

Thank you:

We would like to thank any backer for any contribution in the realization of our project

Shipping:

For shipping to the Europe, you'll need to add an extra $12 for all other continents add $20 (only for the perks where is asked to). How do you add this money? When you select a contribution level, you'll be prompted to enter the total contribution amount just below. Add the $12 or $20$ to the cost of the reward there.
